alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a quinoline moiety which bears a ketone group.
alternative_parents.name: Quinolones and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic polycyclic compounds that an isoindole bearing a ketone.
alternative_parents.name: Isoindolones

alternative_parents.description: Heteropolycyclic compounds with a structure containing isoindole, a benzo-fused pyrrole.
alternative_parents.name: Isoindoles

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a pyridine ring substituted at one or more positions by a hydroxyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Hydroxypyridines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a piperazine ring, which is a saturated aliphatic six-member heterocyclic with two nitrogen atoms at positions 1 and 4, as well as four carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Piperazines

alternative_parents.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
alternative_parents.name: Benzenoids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl chloride functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl chlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a halogen atom, which is indirectly attached to a carbonyl via an intervening vinyl (>C=C<) moiety.
alternative_parents.name: Vinylogous halides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an aromatic ring where a carbon atom is linked to an hetero atom.
alternative_parents.name: Heteroaromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary carboxylic acid amide functional group, with the general structure RC(=O)N(R')H (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary carboxylic acid amides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a lactam ring, which is a cyclic amide of amino carboxylic acids, having a 1-azacycloalkan-2-one structure (or an analogue having unsaturation or heteroatoms replacing one or more carbon atoms of the ring).
alternative_parents.name: Lactams

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the carboxylic acid amidrazone functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Amidrazones

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an N-Alkylidene derivative of hydrazine. They have the generic structure RNN=C(R')R\" (R,R',R\"= H or organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Hydrazones

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one nitrogen atom and one carbon atom linked to each other.
alternative_parents.name: Azacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of oxoacids RnE(=O)OH in which the hydroxy group is replaced by an amino group and the oxo group is replaced by =NR. Amidines include carboxamidines, sulfinamidines and phosphinamidines.
alternative_parents.name: Amidines

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a chlorine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organochlorides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing a quinoline moiety, which consists of a benzene ring fused to a pyrimidine ring to form benzo[b]azabenzene.
class.name: Quinolines and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as hydroxyquinolines. These are compounds containing a quinoline moiety bearing a hydroxyl group.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a quinoline moiety bearing a hydroxyl group.
direct_parent.name: Hydroxyquinolines

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing a quinoline moiety bearing a hydroxyl group.
subclass.name: Hydroxyquinolines

superclass.description: Compounds containing a ring with least one carbon atom and one non-carbon atom.
superclass.name: Organoheterocyclic compounds
